data.title: A Screenwriter Goes Behind the Scenes
data.meta_description: Writer Michael Tolkin's novel The Player is based on his experiences as a screenwriter interacting with film executives in Hollywood.
data.meta_site_name: Fresh Air Archive: Interviews with Terry Gross
data.text:
Transcript currently not available.

Transcripts are created on a rush deadline, and accuracy and availability may vary. This text may not be in its final form and may be updated or revised in the future. Please be aware that the authoritative record of Fresh Air interviews and reviews are the audio recordings of each segment.
